data.title: Phyathai-Paolo and Krungsri Partner for Seamless ASEAN Healthcare
data.description: Phyathai-Paolo Hospital Group led by  Mr. Paiboon Fuengfuskul  (third from right), Chief Financial Officer, and  Dr. Anantasak Apairatana  (second from right), Chief Medical Officer, jointly signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with Krungsri (Bank of Ayudhya PCL) led by  Mr. Pairote Cheunkrut  (third from left), Chief Strategy Officer, and  Miss Pathatai Kulachan  (second from left), Head of ASEAN Business Group, with an aim to create fully integrated healthcare experience through innovative medical technology in combination with financial service for customers in the ASEAN region, especially those from Cambodia in the initial phase, so as to meet the needs for health services in the digital era in a comprehensive way.

data.title: Severe flooding continues in South, trains disrupted
data.description: More than 130,000 households in seven southern provinces have been hit by  floods  following downpours that are forecast to continue in many areas until Dec 3.

data.title: Hunger-striking fraud suspect Samart falls ill
data.description: Politician  Samart Janechaijittawanich , a suspect in a money laundering case linked to The  iCon Group  fraud and money-laundering scandal, has been rushed to the Department of Corrections Hospital after almost four days on  hunger strike  in prison.

data.title: New movies out this week: Nov 28-Dec 4
data.description: New releases that hit cinema in Thailand this week.

data.title: Aquatic plant in high demand in Phayao because of economic value
data.description: Amid surge in demand, ‘Kai Pam’ offers a source of revenue to locals

data.title: Chula embraces AI future with ChulaGENIE, its own gen-AI platform
data.description: In partnership with Google Cloud, university aims to make advanced capabilities accessible to students and staff

data.title: Singapore PM posts images to mark his visit to Thailand
data.description: Singaporean Prime Minister Lawrence Wong posted an X message with images of Wat Arun, Thai students and Chiang Mai golden tigress Ava to mark his arrival in Thailand on Thursday.

data.title: Ex-PPRP spokesman in hospital after blood pressure drops in prison
data.description: Suspect arrested over money-laundering charges related to The iCon Group could not eat due to worries, says Corrections Department spokesperson

data.title: NACC urged to probe state officials’ role in Buri Ram land case
data.description: Thai Social Democratic Party petition questions failure to implement court orders

data.title: House panel calls for review of MOU44 before starting talks on OCA
data.description: The committee also urged the government to discuss the issue in Parliament as it was too large a matter to be decided upon by a few people

data.title: Banyan Tree Residences Sichon and UOB Host Exclusive Clara Evening
data.description: Banyan Tree Residences Sichon, the first luxury branded residence in Nakhon Si Thammarat, recently hosted an exclusive evening reception at Bangkok’s renowned Clara Restaurant. In partnership with UOB Privilege Bank, the event welcomed a select group of high-net-worth individuals and distinguished guests for an unforgettable evening of fine dining, live music, and insightful presentations.

data.title: True Corporation Champions “Tech for Good” with Bold Innovations
data.description: In an era of rapid global change, societies face increasingly complex challenges influenced by diverse factors. In Thailand, social issues such as the rising number of missing persons among elderly individuals with Alzheimer’s disease are becoming more pressing. In 2022, approximately 770,000 elderly individuals were reported to have dementia. Vulnerable groups, including over 300,000 individuals with autism, further highlight the need for tailored solutions. Additionally, human-wildlife conflicts, particularly involving wild elephants, have impacted over 156,066 households annually, causing damage to agricultural land, injuries, and fatalities.

data.title: SKY Group achieves new high record with nine-month revenue surpassing 4.73 billion baht
data.description: SKY Group achieves new high record with nine–month revenue surpassing 4.73 billion baht, marking a 66% robust growth; confident in sustained business momentum as year–end approaches, showcases full biometric system to serve tourists during peak season

data.title: Shade finally returns to main Samui ferry pier
data.description: SURAT THANI - The main  ferry  pier on  Koh Samui  is finally getting its roofs back, after a full year in which passengers have had to endure rain and sometimes scorching sun on their way to and from the boats.

data.title: Police capture fugitive accused of killing 3 over ATM dispute
data.description: The Nong Bua Lamphu native was apprehended in Loei after allegedly shooting and killing three neighbours over a financial dispute

data.title: C.P. Group Alerts Public to Fraudulent Scams
data.description: C.P. Group has issued a statement regarding fraudulent activities currently circulating on social media. Scammers are using the name and image of Mr. Dhanin Chearavanont, Senior Chairman of C.P. Group, in fabricated news articles and advertisements that appear to be credible content from reputable media outlets. These deceptive materials are designed to lure the public into participating in fake investment schemes by promising high returns.

data.title: Bus services from Bangkok to Phnom Penh and Siem Reap resume on Friday
data.description: Service to Cambodian cities restart from Friday after being stopped in March 2020 due to the pandemic

data.title: Rare diseases: A global healthcare challenge
data.description: With only 5% of rare diseases treatable today, there is a clear need for global partnerships and policy reforms to address this urgent challenge

data.title: 136,000+ families in 7 southern provinces hit by heavy flooding
data.description: Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Department says it issued warnings and coordinated with mobile operators to send SMS alerts to residents

data.title: Smart Solutions Empower Thai Agriculture for a Sustainable Future
data.description: Agriculture is a key profession for the Thai people, and Thailand is one of the world

data.title: Gunman surrenders a day after Isan triple killing
data.description: NONG BUA LAM PHU - The 58-year-old  gunman  who shot three people to death in this northeastern province surrendered to police on Thursday, a day after the killings.

data.title: Tourists are flocking to Lopburi’s spectacular sunflower fields
data.description: Spread over 1,600 hectares, the fields offer tourism and agricultural value to the province

data.title: Thailand gets its first 3 Michelin-starred restaurant
data.description: Sorn becomes the first Thai restaurant in the world to be awarded three Michelin stars at the eighth edition of the  Michelin Guide Thailand  2025, held in Bangkok today.

data.title: C.P. Group warns against fraudulent investment scams using senior chairman’s name
data.description: Regarding fraudulent activities currently circulating on social media, scammers have been using the name and image of Mr. Dhanin Chearavanont, Senior Chairman of C.P. Group, in fabricated news articles and advertisements designed to look like credible content from reputable media outlets.

data.title: Colombian arrested over THB3.3m theft in Bangkok mall car park
data.description: Police seize 20 gold bars and cash from suspect but say accomplice has fled to Cambodia with most of loot stolen from luxury car

data.title: Singapore PM in Thailand as both countries strive for closer ties
data.description: Cooperation in new areas of mutual interest on the agenda

data.title: Cathay Pacific accused of mishandling cancelled flight in Bangkok
data.description: Hong Kong flag carrier Cathay Pacific is facing a backlash from some stranded travellers after a flight cancellation in Bangkok left more than 200 passengers stuck in the aircraft for five hours, before they were shuttled to a hotel with their passports taken away without explanation.

data.title: ReWear ReCare: Transforming Textile Waste into Timeless Fashion
data.description: The partnership of three leading Thai brands—PT, Circular, and Yuedpao—introduces the ReWear ReCare collection, a groundbreaking sustainable fashion initiative. This collaboration transforms textile waste into modern lifestyle pieces, creating a circular economy that reduces environmental impact.

data.title: Facial recognition for international flight passengers starts Dec 1
data.description: Facial recognition services at six major airports will be expanded to include passengers on international flights starting Dec 1, according to Airports of Thailand Plc (AOT).

data.title: Floods worsen in Narathiwat, 68 schools close amid rising waters
data.description: Heavy continuous rain makes three main rivers break their banks and inundate more than 40,000 families in 13 districts

data.title: Cyber police target avatar accounts for spreading false allegations against PTT executives
data.description: The Cyber Crime Investigation Bureau (CCIB) is focusing on three "avatar accounts" accused of disseminating false information aimed at tarnishing the reputations of PTT executives. Authorities are preparing to press serious charges against those responsible.

data.title: Illegal Chinese-owned salon in Bangkok shut down
data.description: Police raided an illegal full-service beauty salon owned by a Chinese woman in central Bangkok on Thursday and arrested seven female suspects for working without permits.

data.title: Facial recognition for international flight passengers
data.description: Facial recognition services at six major airports will be expanded to include passengers on international flights starting Dec 1, according to Airports of Thailand Plc (AOT).

data.title: Police join multi-agency response to flooding in South Thailand
data.description: National police chief instructs southern police bureaus to mobilise officers to help flood victims as 13 provinces face heavy rains and flash flooding

data.title: Mapping disasters: How one geologist is saving lives in Thailand
data.description: Prof Santi Pailoplee’s MitrEarth website became a lifeline for northern residents inundated by catastrophic flooding this year

data.title: Police bust int’l ring selling fake accounts to online criminals
data.description: Fifteen arrested, hundreds of thousands of SIM cards seized in Operation ‘CIB Crushes the Grey Dragon’
